DOC.brief_summary: The objective Latella-2 study demonstrate safety efficacy Latella Knee Implant System reduction medial osteoarthritis knee pain .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Latella Knee Implant System Medial Osteoarthritis Pain Reduction ( Latella-2 Study )
DOC.criteria: History pain due medial osteoarthritis Qualifying baseline pain score KellgrenLawrence Grades 23 Osteoporosis Rheumatoid arthritis Joint instability Metal ion allergy Permanent implant around knee joint Prior anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction
